name: Sigfree
body:
# SigFREE
## Signature Free Buffer Overflow Attack Blocker

### What is SigFree?
SigFree is a buffer overflow attack blocker, which is signature free. It's based on a [paper](http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/xpl/login.jsp?tp=&arnumber=4522563&url=http%3A%2F%2Fieeexplore.ieee.org%2Fxpls%2Fabs_all.jsp%3Farnumber%3D4522563) by Xinran Wang and etal. 
### Prerequisites
graphviz
mongodb
php5
apache2
[udis86](https://github.com/vmt/udis86
[rgl](http://rubygems.org/gems/rgl)
[ffi](http://rubygems.org/gems/ffi)
[ffi-udis86](http://rubygems.org/gems/ffi-udis86
)
[graph](http://rubygems.org/gems/graph)
[colorize](http://rubygems.org/gems/colorize)
[json](http://rubygems.org/gems/json)
[mongo](http://rubygems.org/gems/mongo)
### Usage
You can run sigfree as
`ruby proxy.rb`
If you want automated test. Run test.rb from /test 
`ruby test.rb`
If you want a log of inputs, place ui in your apache's www folder
### Well, this is incomplete!
I done this for my college's final year project, where we just need to study the given paper and give an implementation, well completion is not mandatory. So far this project is incomplete and have lot of logical errors. I wish to fix it out soon and make this complete.
tagline: Signature Free Buffer Overflow Attack Blocker
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
